frontend_faq010A.message: En azÄ±ndan 2014 yÄ±lÄ±ndan bu yana Google Chrome (ve muhtemelen diÄŸer Chromium tabanlÄ± tarayÄ±cÄ±larda) bu sorunu/bÃ¶cek sorununu Talkie. Talkie bazÄ± geÃ§ici Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼mleri ve daha kÄ±sa bÃ¶lÃ¼mlerde metin okumayÄ± etkinleÅŸtirmek/devre dÄ±ÅŸÄ± bÄ±rakmak iÃ§in bir seÃ§enek Talkie. frontend_faq010A.original: Google Chrome (and presumably other Chromium based browsers) have had this issue/bug since at least year 2014. Talkie has some workarounds in place, and an option to enable/disable reading text in shorter parts. I will continue to improve the workaround, but until the Chromium team works it might not work 100%. If you experience this issue, please let me know which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using.

frontend_faq010Q.message: Talkie neden 20-30 kelime veya birkaÃ§ saniye sonra okumayÄ± Talkie ?
frontend_faq010Q.original: Why does Talkie stop reading after 20-30 words or a few seconds?

frontend_faq011A.message: Ä°ki sebep var. Ã–ncelikle, etkin ses Ã§evrimiÃ§i ise, konuÅŸmaya baÅŸlamadan Ã¶nce konuÅŸma dosyasÄ±nÄ± indirmesi gerekir. Bu, internet baÄŸlantÄ±nÄ±zÄ±n hÄ±zÄ±na baÄŸlÄ± olarak ek bir duraklama anlamÄ±na gelir. Hangi seslerin Ã§evrimiÃ§i olduklarÄ±nÄ± sesler listesinde kontrol edebilirsiniz. Ä°kinci sebep, uzun metinleri konuÅŸmak iÃ§in yapÄ±lan geÃ§ici Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼m metni kÄ±sa cÃ¼mlelerde, genellikle cÃ¼mle baÅŸÄ±na veya cÃ¼mle baÅŸÄ±na koparÄ±r. Bu, her duraklama iÃ§in fazladan bir duraklatma saÄŸlayabilir. Uzun metinleri, desteklenen sistemlerde duraklatmayÄ± kaldÄ±rmasÄ± gereken seÃ§enekler arasÄ±nda bir bÃ¶lÃ¼m olarak etkinleÅŸtirebilirsiniz.
frontend_faq011A.original: There are two reasons. Firstly, if the active voice is online it needs to download the speech file before playing it. This means an added pause which is depending on your internet connection speed. You can check which voices are online in the list of voices. The second reason is that the workaround for speaking long texts chops up the text in shorter parts, usually per sentence or per clause. This can add an extra pause for each pause. You can enable reading long texts as one part in the options, which should remove the pause on supported systems.

Yine de Talkie herkesin istediÄŸi kadar kullanmasÄ± iÃ§in Ã¼cretsizdir. Hem geliÅŸtirme, hem bakÄ±m hem de Ã¼cretsiz Talkie finansal olarak desteklemek iÃ§in, bazÄ± Ã¶zellikler yalnÄ±zca Talkie Premium kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ± tarafÄ±ndan kullanÄ±labilir.
frontend_faq021A.original: It takes quite a lot of time and effort to develop and maintain Talkie â€” hundreds of hours so far. Yet, Talkie is free for everyone to use as much as they like. To financially support further both development, maintenance and keeping the free Talkie free, some features are only available to Talkie Premium users.

frontend_faq023A.original: Yes, if you paid using PayPal or Stripe, which offer simple refund management. Refunds are generally not available for other methods of payments due to the amount of extra work it requires, plus the risk that the money gets refunded to the wrong account.

frontend_faq026A.message: Onur sistemi, bireylerin dÃ¼rÃ¼st olmaya gÃ¼vendiÄŸi ve sÄ±kÄ± bir ÅŸekilde zorunlu kontroller olmaksÄ±zÄ±n kurallara baÄŸlÄ± kaldÄ±ÄŸÄ± zamandÄ±r. Talkie Premium iÃ§in yÃ¼kseltme yapanlarÄ±n Talkie Premium gÃ¼venmek iÃ§in.
frontend_faq026A.original: The honor system is when individuals are trusted to be honest, and adhere to guidelines without strictly enforced checks. For Talkie Premium trusting that those who upgrade have paid for it.

frontend_faq027A.message: DÃ¼nyanÄ±n her yerindeki insanlar farklÄ± para birimleri kullandÄ±ÄŸÄ±ndan, farklÄ± harcanabilir gelir seviyelerine sahip olduÄŸundan ve Talkie Premium 'un Ã¶zellikleri iÃ§in farklÄ± takdir seviyelerine sahiptir. DÃ¼nyadaki herkes iÃ§in iÅŸe yarayan tek bir sabit fiyat yoktur. Ãœstelik para birimlerindeki dalgalanmalar, ekonomik dÃ¶ngÃ¼ eÄŸilimleri, bÃ¶lgesel/Ã¼lke iÃ§i farklÄ±lÄ±klar, vb. SonuÃ§ olarak, dÃ¼nya Ã§apÄ±nda satÄ±lan bir Ã¼rÃ¼nÃ¼n ayar fiyatlarÄ± karmaÅŸÄ±ktÄ±r. Herkesin kendi fiyatÄ±nÄ± belirlemesine izin vermek ve Ã¼rÃ¼nÃ¼n bir Ã¶deme gerektirecek kadar iyi olmasÄ±nÄ± saÄŸlamak daha kolaydÄ±r.
frontend_faq027A.original: Because people around the world use different currencies, have different levels of disposable income, and have different levels of appreciation for Talkie Premium's features. There is no single, fixed price that works well for everyone in the world. On top of that comes fluctuations in currencies, economic cycle trends, regional/intra-country variations, etcetera. All in all, settings prices for a product sold worldwide is complicated. It is easier to let everyone set their own price, and ensure that the product is good enough to warrant a payment.

frontend_faq027Q.original: Why can I set my own price?

frontend_faq028A.message: Metinden konuÅŸmaya yazÄ±lÄ±ma ne kadar para harcayabileceÄŸinizi Talkie Premium , Talkie Premium nin sizin iÃ§in deÄŸerli olduÄŸunu dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼ndÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nÃ¼z Talkie Premium Ã¶demenizi tercih ederim â€” ne fazla ne de az. Bir referans Ã§erÃ§evesi arÄ±yorsanÄ±z, Google Talkie Premium iÃ§in Ã¶demeleri ele Talkie Premium , Amerika BirleÅŸik Devletleri'nde abonelik maliyeti yÄ±llÄ±k 25 $$ (ABD DolarÄ±) olacaktÄ±r. Google'Ä±n, dÃ¼nya genelindeki Ã¼lkeler ve para birimleri iÃ§in fiyatlarÄ± yerel koÅŸullara uyacak ÅŸekilde ayarladÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± unutmayÄ±n, bu nedenle aÅŸaÄŸÄ± yukarÄ± olabilir. AynÄ± zamanda, kibarca soran herkes Ã¼cretsiz olarak Talkie Premium alabilirdi.
frontend_faq028A.original: Since I don't know how much money you are able to spend on text-to-speech software, I prefer that you pay what you think Talkie Premium is worth to you  â€” no more, no less. In case you are looking for a frame of reference, when Google handled payments for Talkie Premium the subscription cost $$25 (US Dollar) per year in the United States of America. Note that Google adjusted prices around for countries and currencies the world to match local conditions, so it could be more or less. At the same time, anyone who asked politely could also receive Talkie Premium for free.

frontend_faq028Q.original: How much do you recommend I pay?

frontend_faq029A.message: Ã‡Ã¼nkÃ¼ Ã¶demeler ve doÄŸrulama iÃ§in bir sistemin uygulanmasÄ± Ã§ok zaman ve Ã§aba gerektirir ve sÄ±kÄ± Ã¶deme doÄŸrulamasÄ±nÄ±n uygulanmasÄ±nÄ±n maliyetinin, sistemi aldatan kiÅŸilerin kayÄ±plarÄ±ndan daha yÃ¼ksek olduÄŸu varsayÄ±lÄ±r. Ã–deme doÄŸrulamasÄ± ayrÄ±ca, kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ±n sistemlerinden bir miktar veri toplanmasÄ±nÄ± gerektirir ve teknik olarak yetenekli kullanÄ±cÄ±lar genellikle doÄŸrulama konusunda Ã§alÄ±ÅŸabilir. DolayÄ±sÄ±yla, teknik ve ticari aÃ§Ä±dan bakÄ±ldÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda, hiÃ§bir garanti olmamasÄ±na raÄŸmen, kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ±n onur sistemine baÄŸlÄ± olduklarÄ±na gÃ¼venmek daha kolaydÄ±r.
frontend_faq029A.original: Because implementing a system for payments and verification takes a lot of time and effort, and it is assumed that the cost of implementing strict payment verification is higher than the losses from individuals cheating the system. Payment verification also requires some level of data collection from users' systems, and technically skilled users can often work around the verification anyways. So from a technical and business perspective, even though there are no guarantees, it is easier to simply trust that users adhere to the honor system.

frontend_faq029Q.original: Why is there no payment verification?

frontend_faq030A.message: Ã–deme doÄŸrulamasÄ±nÄ± uygulamama kararÄ±, Ã¶denen tutarÄ±n doÄŸrulanamayacaÄŸÄ± anlamÄ±na gelir. Ek olarak, Talkie Premium dijital bir kopyasÄ±nÄ± " Talkie Premium " maliyeti sÄ±fÄ±rdÄ±r, bu nedenle onu Talkie Premium yere vermek, geliÅŸtirici iÃ§in mali bir kayÄ±p anlamÄ±na gelmez. AyrÄ±ca, Talkie Premium hoÅŸunuza Talkie Premium , bunu arkadaÅŸlarÄ±nÄ±za anlatacaÄŸÄ±nÄ±z umudu da var. Talkie Premium vermek bir pazarlama Ã§abasÄ± olarak gÃ¶rÃ¼lebilir.
frontend_faq030A.original: The decision to not implement payment verification means that the amount paid cannot be verified. In addition, the cost of "manufacturing" a digital copy of Talkie Premium is zero, so giving it away for nothing does not imply a financial loss for the developer. There is also the hope that if you like Talkie Premium, you will tell your friends about it. Giving away Talkie Premium can also be seen as a marketing effort.

frontend_faq030Q.original: Why can I choose to pay nothing?

frontend_faq031Q.original: Can I make a recurring monthly or yearly payment?

frontend_faq032A.original: Yes, if you request it via email. Please include your name, address, and optionally your value-added tax (VAT) identifier (or equivalent).

frontend_faq033A.original: Because you like the additional features Talkie Premium provides, and the happy feeling of contributing to open source software development by independent developers. Due to relatively high personell cost of development and maintenance, but zero cost of "manufacturing" digital copies, payments for Talkie Premium can also be seen as providing support for future development and maintenance, as opposed to the value of the product at the time of payment.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie , 2016/2017 Yeni YÄ±lÄ±ndan birkaÃ§ gÃ¼n Ã¶nce bir arkadaÅŸÄ±n meydan okumasÄ±yla geliÅŸtirildi. Zorluk ÅŸu soruyla baÅŸladÄ±: iÅŸe giderken bir makaleyi okumak yerine dinlemek mÃ¼mkÃ¼n mÃ¼? Kolay, dedim ve bunu ispatlamak iÃ§in yola Ã§Ä±ktÄ±m â€” ya da en azÄ±ndan tarayÄ±cÄ±mÄ±n aptal bir bilgisayar sesi kullanarak metni konuÅŸmasÄ±nÄ± saÄŸlamak iÃ§in. Herhangi bir kullanÄ±cÄ± arayÃ¼zÃ¼ olmayan temel sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼n oluÅŸturulmasÄ± Ã¶nemsiz olduÄŸu ortaya Ã§Ä±ktÄ±. Bir kullanÄ±cÄ± arayÃ¼zÃ¼ eklemek biraz daha uzun sÃ¼rdÃ¼. DoÄŸru dil tespiti ekleyerek bir grup daha kod. TarayÄ±cÄ±daki hatalarÄ±n Ã¼stesinden gelmek daha da fazla Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r. Ä°yileÅŸtirmelerin ve Ã¶zelliklerin listesi devam ediyor â€” ve birkaÃ§ bin satÄ±r kod sonra, sonuca bakÄ±yorsunuz.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it â€” or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic edition, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on â€” and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.
